mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDERED_NUM, o.USER_ID, o.PRODUCT_ID, o.ordered_date, p.Brand, p.Product_name, p.Price_amount, p.Image_url FROM Ordered o JOIN Cart c ON c.PRODUCT_ID = o.PRODUCT_ID AND c.USER_ID = o.USER_ID JOIN Products p ON o.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE o.USER_ID = #{userid} AND o.ORDERED_NUM = #{orderedNum}
